channel.title: 508 Emote command help

item.title: 508 Emote command help
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

Ok so i got

} else if (cmd[0].equals("emote")) { p.requestAnim(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);

But instead of having to type in an emote integer i want it to do all the emotes one after another in order and print what id it is. Also iâ€™ll code the timers. Here is what I have atm

} else if (cmd[0].equals("allemotes")) { p.requestAnim; p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Now performing emote" "+p.emoteid+" .");

Yes this code fails a lot but Its a start. I also need someone to help me setup a counter from 1 until i dc.

In 508 Tems this would be called Emote looping.

Read full topic
